argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hdmaplna2.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hdmaplna2.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | hdmaplna2.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 4 |  | hdmaplna2.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) |
| 5 |  | hdmaplna2.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 6 |  | hdmaplna2.q | |- .+^ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 7 |  | hdmaplna2.s | |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) |
| 8 |  | hdmaplna2.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 9 |  | hdmaplna2.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 10 |  | hdmaplna2.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 11 |  | hdmaplna2.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( +g ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 12, 13, 7, 8, 10, 11 | #P_hdmapadd | |- ( ph -> ( S ` ( Y .+ Z ) ) = ( ( S ` Y ) ( +g ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) ( S ` Z ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` ( Y .+ Z ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( S ` Y ) ( +g ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) ( S ` Z ) ) ` X ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 12, 16, 7, 8, 10 | #P_hdmapcl | |- ( ph -> ( S ` Y ) e. ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3, 12, 16, 7, 8, 11 | #P_hdmapcl | |- ( ph -> ( S ` Z ) e. ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 12, 16, 13, 8, 17, 18, 9 | #P_lcdvaddval | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( S ` Y ) ( +g ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) ( S ` Z ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 20 | 15, 19 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` ( Y .+ Z ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) ) ) |
